alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 5:46PM EDT until May 06 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Barnwell County in central South Carolina... Bamberg County in central South Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 545 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rivers Bridge State Park, or 12 miles north of Hampton, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Bamberg, Denmark, Rivers Bridge State Park, Ehrhardt, Olar, Kline, Govan and Bamberg County Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
